short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clicker to click; Number to count; Score to keep - Up or Down

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

- Open in side panel (sidebar)
- Sync across all of your devices
- Grid, list & table layouts
- Small, medium & large font sizes
- Light & dark mode
- Countdown & stopwatch timers
- Adjustable add & subtract steps
- Multiple counters
